AI Description: LHSMDU (Latin Hypercube Sampling Multivariate Data Uncertainty) is a Python library for generating Latin hypercube samples with multivariate data uncertainty. Latin hypercube sampling is a statistical method for generating a sample of plausible scenarios by dividing the input variables into equally probable intervals and sampling once from each interval. LHSMDU extends this concept to incorporate uncertainty in the multivariate data.
Core Features: Latin Hypercube Sampling, Multivariate Data Uncertainty, Python Library
General Tags: Latin Hypercube Sampling, Multivariate Data, Uncertainty Quantification, Statistical Sampling, Python Library
